txt.en: 'Our collected works on language can be found in the back of the Archives, and up the stairs to the left.'
'I desire no part in this. All I want is to have this matter gone from the Archives.'
'What do you want with me? Away with you, [placeholder]!'
'You're here for the scroll, aren't you?'
'The scroll is of no use to me, but the words... the words can unmake the Steward!'
'Your words are wasted on me. The Withered Tree shall see the Steward brought to heel!'
